name: GuessMySecret
0:
”Alexa, guess my secret”
”Alexa, open Guess My Secret”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: guess my secret
des:
Think of an object you have at home, and let Alexa guess it.

Do you usually see it in the living room? Is it bigger than a shoe box? Can you set it on fire? Is it cute? Your answers to these and more questions will help Alexa narrow down her list of possibilities and guess the household item you have in mind. 

Who knows? She may even share a new and interesting fact with you about the object you were thinking of. Like, did you know that the ancient Aztecs used popcorn as jewelry, and not food? Or that the average person spends 3 years of their life on the toilet? 

The fun and learning never stop. So, do you think Alexa can guess your secret?


Please leave a review for this game in the Alexa App! If you have any comments or suggestions, please contact us at feedback@azalealabs.com.
